body_html: @girving Thanks for your attention. The problem is the incompatible of malloc, I think the library of malloc in Google is different with us. If I install the libtcmalloc-minimal4 in Dockerfile everything goes well . I've updated my Dockerfile and commented the line 29.

body: @girving Thanks for your attention. The problem is the incompatible of `malloc`, I think the library of `malloc` in Google is different with us. If I install the `libtcmalloc-minimal4` in Dockerfile everything goes well . I've updated my [Dockerfile](https://gist.github.com/DjangoPeng/ce00add09714f247fe211c1dcff708aa#file-dockerfile-L29) and commented the line 29.
